column2: "Aber a EWURADZE dze Zion fi ndɔmmum sanee bae no
"Ɔno na serew hyɛɛ hɛn afon ma
column3: Na adwontow hyɛɛ hɛn gyirama do ma: Nna wɔkekaa no wɔ amanaman mu dɛ
column4: EWURADZE ayɛ ndzɛmba akɛse ama hɔn."

column3: EWURADZE ayɛ ndzɛmba akɛse ama hɛn; Ntsi na hɛn enyi agye."
fa hɛn fi ndɔmmum san bra
column4: Dɛ mbrɛ edze nsu san ba ɔwora a awew mu."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔpe aba no nyinsuwa mu no

column3: kaansa worusu wɔ ber a wokura aba esusudze no a
column5: ber a wɔdze no efiefi reba no."
